descriptionHtml: Demetrio lives outside in the world of skyrim to find him you need to go to your map and look for the map marker called Demetrio\\\'s camp and there is a draugr called momia that is also a follower and a sabrecat that follows you around anywhere you go Demetrio is a merchant and follower ill try to make momia a merchant to later and you people help me by uploading images if there is any bugs tell me.
author: Aser12
